product_name: Twin Six The Standard Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Twin Six came out with the Standard Collection in 2013 to provide pro-level riders with premium bike wear. The Standard Bike Jersey for men is understated yet supremely comfortable. Soft-touch polyester microfiber wicks sweat and dries fast. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Full-length center zipper; 3 deep rear pockets. The Standard Bike Jersey for men has a droptail hem with elastic gripper so jersey stays in place as you ride.
short_description: Twin Six came out with the Standard Collection in 2013 to provide pro-level riders with premium bike wear. The Standard Bike Jersey for men is understated yet supremely comfortable.
